body: Your wing feathers are made of gleaming metal.
name: Metallic Wings
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Aasimars/New Racial Rules/Aasimar Feats/Metallic Wings

sections.body: Angelic Blood, Angelic Flesh, Angel Wings, aasimar, character level 11th.
sections.name: Prerequisites

sections.body: You gain two wing attacks. These are secondary natural attacks that deal 1d4 points of slashing damage (or 1d3 if you are Small).
sections.name: Benefit
